author: sogol_malek
content: thanks for sharing this opportunity <@686695036733227017> ! excited to see if I get the chance to be involved! this is my EIP proposal that I'm working on it yet and   I've applied with: EIP-X stateless Account abstraction that scales Ethereum https://ethresear.ch/t/proposing-stateless-light-client-as-the-foundation-for-stateless-account-abstraction/15901?u=sogolmalek  I'd be grateful for comments, thoughts, suggestions.

author: mariohavel
content: Thank you all for sharing your applications with us, it's incredible how many talented people are interested! Now we have a lot of reading and tough decisions in front of us. But meanwhile, please remember that the program is opened and permissionless. You don't have to mind result of your application and can start contributing even today! https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-four/tree/master/program-guide

author: j.lw
content: Big thanks to you and the rest of the team for taking the time to give us all such a great opportunity!

author: geemo_candama
content: Should we have received a confirmation email when we submitted our applications? I submitted yesterday but  I didn't receive anything, so I just want to make sure the application was received.

author: joshd4078
content: No confirmation are sent via email. But if you got the confirmation after submitting on the form, you should be good. Shoot me a DM if you want confirmation.
